alert.note: Alert for Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued February 16 at 2:23AM CST until February 18 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM EST THURSDAY... ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY MORNING THROUGH LATE THURSDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...For the Wind Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. For the High Wind Watch, south winds 25 to 40 mph with gusts up to 80 mph possible. * WHERE...Cocke Smoky Mountains, Southeast Greene, Blount Smoky Mountains, Sevier Smoky Mountains and Southeast Monroe Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Advisory, until 7 AM EST Thursday. For the High Wind Watch, from Thursday morning through late Thursday night. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are possible. Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds.

area.areaDesc: Blount Smoky Mountains; Cocke Smoky Mountains; Sevier Smoky Mountains; Southeast Greene; Southeast Monroe
